NewsArticle.Title: Welcome to the New Dark Ages!!
NewsArticle.Content:
If you haven't noticed, we have changed the Dark Ages official website. Here you will find all the features from the old site as well as some new features like the "Gameplay" section. You will also see images for the new update. Speaking of which, the client for the new update will be available to download at around 10:00pm pst today!! We will update the server soon after. The game server will be down after 10:00pm pst for a few minutes as we update.
DA Team
